name: Pearl
description:
Creamy creamy boom boom pow says Pearl.  Thanks to the pair of 6" poly woofers she's siting on.  The perfect travel package has been made available, now, right here.  If you are actually going to listen to music everywhere you go...Pearl is for you.  The pair of horns and silver 3" midrange round out her 100W of power and style.  This girl won't last long.

Dimensions- 16"x14"x7"

Upcycled %- 87%

name: Linus
description:
The gray on gray weave and trim lay down the stylish groundwork for the vintage Fischer set.  A white and black 8" woofer, a 4" mid, and a 3" tweeter are all you could need for fun, but the style of the crisp custom horn makes this case sing.  With 100W this vintage setup will warm your bones.  Boom, Linus has arrived.

Dimensions- 21"x14"x7.5"

Upcycled %- 98%

name: Big guy
description:
This guy right here...Yes him.  The Big Guy in a little case.  The more I see him the more I realize how special he is.  This Forecast case is vinyl and chrome on the outside but all Big stuff inside.  A pair of offset 5.5" woofers lay down the ground work for the two 2" square full range HiWave drivers to fill in where the pair of 1.5" tweeters leave off.  The resonance of these vinyl briefcases makes a mountain out of a molehill.  Insert 100W of Digital boom and we are off to the races.

Dimensions- 18.5"x14.5"x5"

Upcycled %- 90%

name: Velma
description:
Sometimes you drip.  Velma is like that everyday...Dripping with uniqueness that only you understand.  A classy mid century train case that has been transformed into flower power and Scooby Doo in one.  The pair of 4" Aluminum cone woofers will bump and the chromed directional tweeters carve a path.  Insert 50w and Velma will get your groove on.

Dimensions- 14.5"x10"x10"

Upcycled %-84

name: Sammy the Spider
description:
A briefcase is what you carry your TPS reports in ...Sammy is for everything that matters.  Peppered with 3" full range drivers, 6 in all Sammy is piercing power.  The 100w amp will also be divided among the two 1.5" full range aluminum drivers and the 2 1' dome tweeters.  It is all laid into the padded leather face to add a quilted effect that is only business casual at best.  This thin wizard will set it off.

Dimensions- 17"x13"x3.5"

Upcycled %- 99%

name: Baby Gucci
description:
Baby describes her size, but Gucci describes her attitude and presence when she enters a room.  A clever leather and wood handbag converted into a perfect carry on with bump.  The 3.5" Vifa woofer will deliver the baby bump as the 4 1.5" full range aluminum drivers bring it home.  The quilted leather styling with unique clasps is something that will leave you staring.  Insert a 50w amp and you day out will be complete.

Dimensions- 12"x8.5"x5"

Upcycled %- 96%

name: "The Royal Box" Boombox Construction Kit
description:
The Boombox construction kit is exactly what it sounds like.  Over our years of building sound systems from things were never engineered to be sound systems we decided to share our fun with you.

There are three Kits representing your level of Bommboxalypse you wish to dive into.  All come with all ingredients minus the vessel to make a self powered music device.  All kits are complete with easy color match crimp connectors, no soldering involved.  Good for any DIY maker or creative person you might know.  Hip-Hop enthusiast, or sneakerhead, they all will love it.

"The Royal Box" Kit comes with-

two Dayton Audio RS150T-8 6" Reference Woofer, 
two Dayton Audio AMT Mini-8 Air Motion Transformer Tweeter,
a 200 w amp,
A rechargeable NiMh battery system (good for 10 hours of playtime)
an illuminated power switch,
a volume control,
black brass volume knob,
an 1/8" stereo input (headphone sized)
bluetooth input,
chrome input selector switch,
screws,knobs,cords,etc...we thought of everything

The images below are from the Boombox construction kit charity event we held and they were a few of the creative things people built with our kits.

name: Dink
description:
Don't let the name fool ya.  Wrapped in all that fancy trim Dink might be small but his Vintage JVC 7" woofer is a thumper.  Match that with a brushed out chrome 4" Mid and 3" tweeter both Vintage Pioneer and with a 100W you make a scene.  The perfect size and shape to always be by your side.  

Dimensions- 17"x 12"x 6.5"

Upcycled %-98 

If you would like a Bluetooth input as well as the standard 1/8"

name: Baphomet Blaster
description:
Demon's need boomboxes too.  Case of Bass surrendered a classic brown leather Samsonite to Martin Ontiveros and Blam!  G.O.A.T. was born.  Of paint a Sabbath, this metal case will shred Slayer every morning before you start your day killing.  A 10" woofer, 3" full range , and 1" titanium dome tweeter are all masked by Martin's brain child.  Then to beat all both sides are completely covered in metal spikes.  A sound system or self defence mace of death....with 200W it is both. 

Dimensions- 24" x 15.5" x 8"

Upcycled%-  85%

If you would like a Bluetooth input as well as the standard 1/8"

name: Prince Paulie B
description:
Samsonite gone through the Eatcho looking glass.  Prince Paulie B is straight out of the Case of Bass workshop, through the doodles brain and to your life.  Always amaze balls and truly a one of a kind this case is it.   With two " woofers, a 4.5" sub and two full Range 3" Tang Band drivers.  200w and ready to get your party going.

Dimensions- 22" x 16" x 8"

Upcycled% -86%

If you would like a Bluetooth input as well as the standard 1/8"

name: Mookie
description: A special collaboration between Case of Bass and the very talented Sam Arneson.  The vision is all Sam's with his creative use of the theme to create a virtual ballet of the robotic/electronic and a dream organic.  Bumping a 10" clear poly woofer, two 3" tweets and a 4" full range driver, Mookie rocks 200W of total engulfing sound and sight.

name: Cream
description:
The pinnacle of installation cream, Cream is a work between Case of Bass and Make House PDX.  The idea that we could screen the waveform representation Wu-Tang's "Cream" in a repeating pattern over a case was only better than we could have imagined.  To add to this there are a pair of dual voice coil 8" woofers, a 3.5" midrange Aiwa driver, a 3" driver, a pair of 1" poly dome tweeters and a horn make this cream frothe. With 200W pushing it, this is one of a kind by definition.

Dimesions- 21.5" x 14.5" x 8.5"

Upcycled%-  73%

If you would like a Bluetooth input as well as the standard 1/8" 
-add it to your cart below in Case Accessory

name: Walter
description:
A Masterpiece of square proportions.  The offset 12" honeycomb Square Sony woofer bumps this sassy Gray on gray box with sparkles. the balance of the matching 4" square honeycomb mid and the crosshair protected tweeter offset equally the opposite way.  The negative space is filled with smaller squares and rectangles.  Two being a pair of 2" full range HiWave drivers, A horn for good measure and we have Walter.  The baddest man on the block...200w bad.

Dimensions- 21.5"x19"x9"

Upcycled %-92 

If you would like a Bluetooth input as well as the standard 1/8" 
-add it to your cart below in Case Accessory

name: Thor
description:
Viking lore speaks of a Boombox that was dropped by Zeus and hit the earth with such a rumble that Booty Basement nodded.   This studded and plated and pedigreed Hartman case of medieval delight called for a special bit of design.  Dual 10" woofers left enough room tho drop in a pair of 4" aluminum cone full Range drivers.  A pair of the sold 2" HiWave full range square drivers to compliment the case and the two square 1" titanium dome tweeters.  The sheer mass of Thor makes the ground shake.  tote it if you dare.  This case will be powered by 400w, For real.

Dimensions- 24"x20"x8.5"

Upcycled %-63

name: Star Crusher
description:
The ability to create a black hole will be yours with the new and improved Starcrusher. (not recommended in this solar system)  If you want a crushing giant boombox, then use it on your block.  The dual 10" Advent carbon fiber woofers will keep the haters biting as you romp by with authority, 4" advent full range driver handles the fill while 4 cleverly place 1" poly dome tweeters make the heavens sing.  In a perfectly balanced and stylish gray on gray with clean lines case and not so subtle attitude.  it's gotta be 200W or maybe more.

Dimensions- 26.5"x16.5"x9"

Upcycled %-98 

If you would like a Bluetooth input as well as the standard 1/8" 
-add it to your cart below in Case Accessory

name: Ringo
description:
Legendary, Knighted, maybe a Duke...people might ask if you are those things when they see this relic in your possession.  Ringo is a case crafted in the dreams of Hip-Hop royalty.  The clean Gray pattern only accentuates the darker gray trim with white stitching.  he layout and shape of the case could only be complimented more by the super rare Sony Square Honeycomb 12" woofer.  The 5" Honeycomb square mid and 2' tweeter are housed like Lancelot before a tournament.  Finally flanked by two 2" HiWave square full range drivers and a pair of poly dome tweeters to balance out this Mountain of Music.  200W and you get a country named after you.

Dimensions- 26.5"x 16.5"x 9"

Upcycled %-92 

If you would like a Bluetooth input as well as the standard 1/8" 
-add it to your cart below in Case Accessory

name: Mantis
description:
Stacked like a wood pile in Vermont in October...Mantis has so many surprises.  Starting with the obvious the two 8" yellow poly Sony woofers laid out on the Dusty Blue texture of this beautiful case.  The centerpiece is the uniform Sony 3" Poly mid and dome tweeter combo.  The pair of perfectly spaced Velodyne dome tweeters add a bump of flavor before letting way to the two 1" Logitech full range drivers and the sneaky little 2" Logitech full range at the bottom.  Eyeing you like she's just mated with you and is hungry for your head.   200W and stay away from the bitey end

Dimensions- 21.5"x19"x9.5"

Upcycled %-96

name: Jolly Green Machine
description:
We are still searching the earth for the BoomBox Yoda that can roll with Jolly Green and not look like a little kid in their parents shoes.  Jolly will clown you with his might.  The first of the dual 12" woofer series, these chunky trimmed vintage Pioneer woofers rumble.  the 2" HiWave full range pair and the set of 1" poly dome tweeters look like flies on an elephant's back.  Luckily their punch comes in small packages...even it all out with a horn front and center.  The only way to push this train is with 200w and I promise Sprout will pop and lock when you roll up.

Dimensions- 26.5"x18"x8.5"

Upcycled %-96

If you would like a Bluetooth input as well as the standard 1/8" 
-add it to your cart below in Case Accessory

name: Harlan Pepper
description:
The wiser more distinguished Pepper brother, he is.  Harlan comes correct in his years, a perfect blend of a Vintage Sansui 12" woofer, the matching 4' Sansui mid, a pair of vintage Pioneer dome tweeters, and the off set Sansui Horn.  All this laid out on a powerfully sleek textured case with black leather trim, stainless hardware and a clear Lucite handle.  Oh my Harlan you are almost too much.  100W will do with these efficient vintage speakers, but we decided 200w would be more fitting a man about town such as Harlan Pepper.

Dimensions- 21.5"x18.5"x9.5"

Upcycled %-97

If you would like a Bluetooth input as well as the standard 1/8"

name: Felixx
description:
Crisp blue and white will set you flying like a falcon playing in a mountain stream on a summer day.  Felixx is a triumph of power and style.   His visually textured panels offer the perfect resting place for the base of the rumble he brings.  The Goldwood white poly 6.5" pair of woofers offer the groundwork for the Peerless 6.5 woofer dead center.  Flanked by 3.5" fiberglassed coned full range drivers.  With a pair of 1" poly cone tweeters at the top the symphony of sight and sound will be your new escape from all that is ugly in the world.  Wrapped around the blue is a creamy white trim.  200w is really the only way to play.

Dimensions- 21"x17"x7"

Upcycled %-65 

If you would like a Bluetooth input as well as the standard 1/8" 
-add it to your cart below in Case Accessory

name: COB Brittania
description:
You won't be hauling her Majesty's socks in this wardrobe.  Britannia is the un-stinkable of the two royal vessels.  She stands taller than most 3rd graders and is smarter in every way.  Smart is a term meaning stylish and on time...Please allow me to introduce my dedication to Britannia.  She holds a very distinguished 10" vintage Sansui woofer at her core.  Below is a set of 4" pioneer mids in matching trims.  Then to beat all, her directional array of mids and tweets from the same vintage Sansui set.  It's all powered by 200W and you will thank me when it's regaling you with tales of the sea from your library.


Dimensions- 21.5"x30.5"x11"

Upcycled %-99 

If you would like a Bluetooth input as well as the standard 1/8" 
-add it to your cart below in Case Accessory

name: Charlie Pepper
description:
Charlie is the punchy brother of Harlan.  They make up the Pepper brothers.  Crafted from matching cases that would have carried the royal luggage.    If that royalty was James Brown himself.  By their clear Lucite sculpted handles.  Charlie pepper represents the brute of the two.  He's loaded first and foremost with two 8" dual voice coil poly/paper woofers.  These are no joke.  To round out his Pedigree there are a pair of 4" vintage Pioneer mids and the matching Vintage Pioneer horn.  Nothing about Charlie is ordinary and if you think you can handle him, and his 200W portable power-plant. Gitty-up

Dimensions- 21.5"x18.5"x9.5"

Upcycled %-76 

If you would like a Bluetooth input as well as the standard 1/8"

name: Phweed
description:
This kind of style takes an eye to spot...if you picked it up in the name then you already know...The Faux tweed print offers a life without unraveling and yet all the amazing benefits of a tweed look.  A nicely placed 8" JVC woofer is wrapped in metallic trim making just the right amount of room for a 4" poly mid and a pair of vintage tweeters from a HiFi kit you uncle probably had, all power players in their own right.  100W and the is no Faux sound from this Phweed player.

Dimensions- 20.5"x 14.5"x 7"

Upcycled %-97

name: Natasha
description:
Moulded from the forges of creamy plastics at Samsonite comes Natasha.  An outspoken full of herself young lady with quick wit.  The drum beat will emanate from the 6.5" Peerless woofer at her core.  Polk Audio balances out with a set of her favorite 4" satellite drivers.  The icing drips from this cake with 2 mini dome tweeters for style and zing, a set of 2" mids about the edge and a horn to hit those highs hard.  add 100W and this lady will sing.

Dimensions- 22"x 18"x 8"

Upcycled %-78 

If you would like a Bluetooth input as well as the standard 1/8" 
-add it to your cart below in Case Accessory

name: Merv
description:
The greatest case in the world lies before your eyes.  Buy it now, or someone else will and you'll be sorry.  Merv is a perfect storm that will be responsible for the next batch of babies when he blacks out the west coast bearing down like a Hurricane.  What does all this mean, you ask?  He doesn't look like all that.  He is a prizefighter in a tweed suit with Shell toes on.  The double Dayton dual voice coil 8" coated woofers are the thunder, A 3" Tang Band full Range driver is the storm surge and the pair of 1" poly dome tweeters bring the lightning.  Besides being the best dressed he will whoop ya.  200w of yowza.

Dimensions- 21.5"x 14.5"x 7.5"

Upcycled %-78 

If you would like a Bluetooth input as well as the standard 1/8" 
-add it to your cart below in Case Accessory

name: Iron Stan
description:
Laid out from the solid stock that built the world we love to listen too.  Three generations of Vintage Pioneer come together to form like Voltron and Gobots having a BoomBox lovechild.  The 6" woofers are trimmed in a protective rubber bumper, then up to the two Seriously brushed steel trimmed 4" mids.  Balancing it off with a beautifully patinated steel dome tweeter.  Add two 2" square full range HiWave drivers and a 1" poly dome tweeter for full coverage and Iron Stan will swing next to John Henry. 100W is all this vintage package wants to crush it.

Dimensions- 21.5"x15"x7.5"

Upcycled %-99

name: Icarus
description:
Icarus didn't really listen...well that's because this case blew his earholes out and then burned him up in the sun.  Yep, I'm saying this case is loud and hot!  A pair of 6" Dayton reference series woofers are all scorch and pain, and while that would have been sufficient for this sized case, we doubled down with a second set of 5" Goldwood woofers.  Ok, OK that's it right? Yeah, not likely...add 4 more 2" full range drivers from HiWave.  wire it all up to 10, 000W and...ok that's just dumb.  200 watts is all the FAA will allow.

Dimensions- 21.5"x17"x8"

Upcycled %-50 

If you would like a Bluetooth input as well as the standard 1/8" 
-add it to your cart below in Case Accessory

name: Dorothy
description:
If given my choice what i would bring to accompany me trekking along the yellow brick road, yep Dorothy is still the best choice.  No singing Munchkins and no howling monkeys.  This is the answer to all you travel problems.  A design vortex that will take you away from the mundane.  Wrapped around a dual voice coil 8" woofer there are a pair of HIWAVE 3.5 " fullrange drivers at the bottom.  The piercing style of the pair of 3" full range dayton reference monitors with witch-melting clarity, and the 1" pair of poly dome tweeters are you cackling crescendo.  200W and  there's no boom like Dorothy. 

Dimensions- 21.5"x15.5"x7.5"

Upcycled %-78

name: Bert
description:
This tweed with matching brown leather trimmed Strat-away Case was made in Seattle, WA, but came down to Portland all these years later to be outfitted.  This includes a No Joke set of JBL 7" woofers.  That's pretty sweet, but add the Matching pair of JBL 1" titanium dome tweeters and we have a situation.  Wait, there's still more..A pair of poly domed tweets and a 2" HiWave square full range to make Bert the coolest kid on Sesame Street.  With a 200W amp I can't imagine you wouldn't have all the fun.

 
Dimensions- 21" x 14" x 7.5"

name: Smokey
description:
Fire Detections Services is ironic when Smokey is starting all the fires...On the dance floor!  A box of boom in black trimmed in silver with metal wrapped corners.  This box has been slightly modified to serve a different purpose.  Adding an 8" vintage EPI woofer to each end and the matching tweeters up front.  65?  I'm not sure but this case will bump 100W all night long.

name: Silas
description:
I might keep this old boy for my personal playa.  Silas is the best of all worlds.  A small enough case to be convenient and go everywhere with ya.  An 8" Dual Voice coil woofer for my bumps I love.  A 4" Sansui Mid for vintage style and clarity, A 1" titanium dome tweeter for plenty of headroom on the high end, and last but not least a cleverly placed pair of Logitech 1" full range drivers to color it all just right.   Did I mention or can't you plainly see the perfectly worn fabric pattern wrapped with a nice brown leather trim.  Silas want's 100w to do it right and if that perfect lucite handle with a touch of red at the base doesn't just get ya...leave this site and never return.

The way a vintage speaker quilts into the leather or pleather of a padded briefcase is just how I imagined they wanted it.  Especially when it's a nice classic brown with a full set of Infinity Vintage speakers.  The concave surround of the 7" woofer is just right next to the matching 5" mid and Polycell 1" dome foam tweeter.  This business casual encounter is 50W deep and all the way cool.

name: Noodle
description:
Packing heat like a gangsta on Valentines day Noodles is not one to laugh at.  He might have a Viola and he might have a tommy gun.  You wanna find out?  What I will tell you is that behind that slick black varnish there is a pair of  5" Dayton reference drivers and a pair of sony 3" tweeters.  That's enough to get you in the band.  You're a DJ right.  100W for good measure.

name: Murphy
description:
Like  Murphy before him Robo-Cop came from hard beginnings...All black and no muss in this package.  The dual voice coil 8" coated woofer will fill your soul with a metaphorical hail of gunfire.  The classic Yamaha 4 1/2" full range pair are the corporate pressure from below and the vintage pioneer tweeters spray like toxic waste.  The metaphor pretty much explains how awesome this setup is.  With 100w amp dead or alive Murphy will bump.

name: Five Spot
description:
Mix it up many ways we do, but this is a smooth customer.  Simply engineered to look and sound like a boss.  Five fingers of soothing channels press the air around your head to force that smile.  The 8" coated paper woofer with rubber surround lays the low end for a pair of 5.5" full range coated drivers down low.  The theme of white and brass make the sound of a wailing sax complete with the pair of 1 1/8" Dayton Neodymium tweeters.  You're welcome my friend.  100W drives a load of smooth here.

name: Dilbert
description:
Created in the pixels of the past, Dilbert is Q-Bert's larger-younger brother.  He's not as wise and thats why you have to be careful with his big mouth.  It'll get you in trouble.  On the other hand, if trouble is your game...in 8 bit.  insert quarter and unleash the dual 5.5" poly woofers, a pair of our fav 2" full range tuned mids in a square format...and the holy bellows of a horn.  100w is all you'll need to get it done.

Dimensions- 20.5" x 16.5" x 8"

name: Snoops
description:
Snoops is a hybrid jazz man and Mariachi man...This classic trumpet case is something special.  The matching amber handle to the perfectly grained leather in a sunburst orange and wrapped in red lather on the corners with just the right amount of wear to tell a story.  Lined up are four Bose 2.5" full range drivers and a horn to round off the high end.  insert a 50w amp and you can leave the brass at home.

Dimensions- 22"x8"x6"

Upcycled %-97

name: Norman
description:
Ancient chinese secret..bring your own BoomBox and you choose the soundtrack to your life.  Norman is a personal party package with a vintage style.  The red faux gator bookends the characters woven into the thatched paper that covers Mr Wong.  A clever clear handle and brass hardware make way for the pair of 4" Peerless woofers and set of 1" poly dome tweeters and a 3" Mid with an oversized dust cap.  50W will deliver tunes on demand for days.

Dimensions- 16"x11"x5.5"

Upcycled %-78

name: Harold
description:
So this guy, named Harold...kinda felt like he was all forehead.  Nothing against the Harold's of the world, or big foreheads, so don't judge this guy.  You wouldn't go up against Frankenstein in a head bonking competition.  Same story here, small and dense like a coconut.  The pair of 6.5" Dayton reference series woofers, are the best in the west.  Add to that a pair of HiWave square full range 2" drivers and a 1" titanium dome tweeter and you just got bonked by 100W..maybe 200w if you wanna level yourself.

Dimensions- 15.5"x13"x7.5"

Upcycled %-72

-add it to your cart below in Case Accessory

name: Blob
description:
BLOB....Ha, see it's just fun to say. This guy is going to make someone very happy. A small unique Sony camera case from Tokyo turned boomer. The cube of cuddles...in the front and center of Blob's little face is a 6.5" Aiwa woofer...it's no toy. Then Logitech added two 1" full range in the center and two 2" mids flanking that. I might try 100W, but then Blob might have a blow out.

Dimensions- 9.5"x10.5"x7"

Upcycled %- 100%

If you would like a Bluetooth input as well as the standard 1/8" 
-add it to your cart below in Case Accessory 

Bass Price- $375

name: Astro-Boy
description:
The right case for the right job. Astro's clean futuristic-ish style is reminiscent of a time of superheroes in just tights and not armor. His silver wrapped 6.5" woofer and 3.5" tweeter are all you need to stroll with subtle confidence. Powered by 50w, This boy has a man's strut. Light and clean to the end the Starflite name is worn with pride.

Dimensions- 14.5"x12.5"x5"

Upcycled %- 100%

Bass Price- $300

name: Dora
description:
Somewhere out there in the world there is a home for Dora. A delightful Decoupage of inspiring images over a pea green Samsonite. Don't get me wrong this case is a conversation starter, and a show stopper. With her 10" woofer, 3" mid and a pair of dome tweeters,Dora and a 100W amp will bump and boom. Take her around the world with you and find out.

Dimensions-21.5"x17"x8"

Upcycled %- 85% 

If you would like a Bluetooth input as well as the standard 1/8" 
-add it to your cart below in Case Accessory

name: Princess Pow
description:
Hello there PrincessPOW, what a find this case was. Like a diplomat of pink style the asymmetrical layout is perfect for what we do. With her 10" silver dome capped woofer, 4" midrange driver and 1" titanium dome tweeter her sash should read Miss Universe. Insert 100W and she will get you more than attention.

Dimensions-21.5"x18.5"x6"

Upcycled%-89%

If you would like a Bluetooth input as well as the standard 1/8" 
-add it to your cart below in Case Accessory

name: Pancake
description:
Square edged vintage case that is a designers delight. The smooth 10" Goldwood high output woofer is surrounded by two 3" full range Tang Band drivers and a 3" vintage tweeter for your highs. The case was inspired by a romp through the mountainside. Add a 200W amp and you will hear why.

Dimensions-21"x16.5"x6"

Upcycled %- 87%

If you would like a Bluetooth input as well as the standard 1/8" 
-add it to your cart below in Case Accessory

name: Squirt
description:
A stack in a box that wasn't meant to hold a stack.  This Trans World Creations case is host to two 5" vintage blue and black Sony woofers.  One mid bass, and the lower one a sub.  Then a set of sneaky little black dome tweeters.  Power Squirt up with a 100W aamp and great things come in small boxes...

Dimensions- 8.5"x13.5"x6.5"

Upcycled %- 98%


If you would like a Bluetooth input as well as the standard 1/8" 
-add it to your cart below in Case Accessory

name: USB Charging Port
description: If only every device had the battery life of a Case of Bass. Well hey don't and how embarresing would it be to have a case but your phone is dead and you can't bump your tunes? Well add this panel mount upgrade to any case and you can plug in to charge your iPod or any device that requires USB charging.

name: CrackerJack
description:
Oh Creamy goodness with a prize in every box...Get some.  This sweet creamy white Carousel case holds treasures.  Three 6" neodymium magnet woofers,  a 3" swedish Vifa Mid ,and a pair of 1" titanium dome  tweeters are all yours in this tasty package.  Power it up with 100W and you can be heard from space or the carnival, whichever suits your fancy, but nonetheless you will be fancy.  Free buttered popcorn for first hundred listeners.


Dimensions- 21"x15.5"x7"

Upcycled%- 65%

If you would like a Bluetooth input as well as the standard 1/8" 
-add it to your cart below in Case Accessory

name: 24K
description:
POW, BAM, BLING!!! there you have a description.  A monochromatic gold lovers dream.  The 12" GOLD Sansui woofer, is helped out by two 2" GOLD mid/tweets.  If you love it you love it...if not then you should just move along then. There is nothing to see here.  100W and pow!

Upcycled %-87 


If you would like a Bluetooth input as well as the standard 1/8"

name: Snake Eyes
description:
Sharp yet gentle, Snake eyes has hit the nail on the head. A tiny little package that with its Lucite handle it holding two Tang Band full range 3.5" woofers with chromed out tweet caps right in the centers. A special junk in the trunk 4" woofer was added to make sure this tiny purse packs the proverbial punch.50 W is enough to power this mini boomer. 

Dimensions- 9"x8.5"x7"

Upcycled %-65


If you would like a Bluetooth input as well as the standard 1/8"

name: Bunny
description:
Truly a classic vintage Samsonite flower power and all. Finding such a rare gem in a suitcase alone would be a score, but this...I do declare.  Don't let the gentle appearance fool ya, Bunny is fierce.  White 10" Sansui woofers and a pair of 2.5" specially trimmed Sansui tweets all surround the Cerwin vega mid dead center. 200W amp and we have a very stunning piece for any modern abode in need of a center piece.


Dimensions-26"x22"x9.5"

Upcycled %- 90
 

If you would like a Bluetooth input as well as the standard 1/8" 
-add it to your cart below in Case Accessory

name: Elmer
description:
Going Fishing? Elmer wants to come, but I'm afraid his dual 3" Bose woofers and 5" hat woofer will scare away your catch. A mix of leather and tweed this will be a must have for some special person. 50W is all it takes to get Elmer jamming.

name: Bluetooth Input
description: Maybe wires aren't your bag. If you want to cut the cord and transmit your tunes via wireless connection this is the upgrade for you. In addition to the standard 3.5mm stereo input, flip the switch and your case will pair with any device that's set to transmit Bluetooth audio. So from your home computer, iPad, iPhone, Droid, or whatever you like... up to 15M you are in control. Wirelessly control tracks and volume, BT puts ya in the drivers seat.

name: Luggage Tag style Ipod holder
description:
Tote your case around with your iPod, iPhone, etc and cord neatly tucked away in this hand crafted Luggage tag style iPod holder. Draped from the handle of your case the Argentinian leather with stainless rivets and a clear vinyl window to allow you full access to your iPod or touchscreen device.

Now available in Blue and Cream, and Green and cream

Dimensions-6.5"x4.5"x.25"
